item.title: Docker学习笔记
item.description: 安装 ubuntu 安装docker 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 sudo apt-get update sudo apt install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu bionic stable" sudo apt-get update apt-cache policy docker-ce # 验证docker repo添加成功 sudo apt-get install docker-ce # 安装docker sudo systemctl status docker # 验证docker安装成功 ubuntu 安装 docker-compose 1 2 3 sudo curl -L "https://github.
